Last week in San Francisco, Sergio Marchionne told reporters that two corporate structures for Fiat and Chrysler don't make sense after the U.S. automaker goes public. In the next two or three years we will be able to see a single entity. It could be based here in the United States, he was quoted as saying by Italy's Corriere della Sera.
